domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Last week, President Trump claimed the virus would "fade away."

Now, we're facing a record-high number of new cases, and it's surging across the country.

Trump refuses to listen to the experts and take action — and we're all paying the price.
